name: DataTransferItem.webkitGetAsEntry
description: If the item described by the DataTransferItem is a file, webkitGetAsEntry() returns a FileSystemFileEntry or FileSystemDirectoryEntry representing it. If the item isn't a file, null is returned.

refs.name: File and Directory Entries API
refs.description: The definition of 'webkitGetAsEntry()' in the 'File and Directory Entries API' specification.
